TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParameterBuilder extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParameterBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ParameterBuilder
.class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit ParameterBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ParameterBuilder

span.span: Creates or associates parameter information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数特性需要与方法签名一致。Parameter attributes need to consistent with the method signature. 如果 `Out` 为参数指定特性，则应确保该方法参数的类型为 `ByRef` 类型。If you specify `Out` attributes for a parameter, you should ensure that the type of that method parameter is a `ByRef` type. 某些 特性要求 使用可行参数调用，以便 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 在运行时正常工作。Some attributes require that you call with viable parameters in order for the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) to work correctly at runtime. 例如，如果 为的参数1定义 With ParameterAttributes `MethodBuilder` ，则的参数 1 必须是引用，如类型. Gettype ( "system.string&" ) ，而不是类型 Gettype ( "system.string" ) 。For example, if you define a with ParameterAttributes.Out for parameter 1 of a `MethodBuilder`, then parameter 1 of must be a reference such as Type.GetType("System.String&"), rather than Type.GetType("System.String"). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用通过引用传递的参数来创建动态方法 `ParameterBuilder` 。The following example demonstrates how to create a dynamic method with a parameter passed by reference using `ParameterBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetConstant (object defaultValue);

abstract member SetConstant : obj -> unit override this.SetConstant : obj -> unit

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 该参数的默认值。

span.span: The default value of this parameter.
Sets the default value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 限制为以下类型： `Boolean` 、、、、、、、、、、、、、 `SByte` `Int16` `Int32` `Int64` `Byte` `UInt16` `UInt32` `UInt64` `Single` `Double` `DateTime` `Char` `String` 和 `Enum` 。`defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`. 如果参数类型为引用类型，则 CLS 遵从性要求为 `defaultValue` `null` 。If the parameter type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`. 但是，从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ， `defaultValue` 只要可将值分配给该引用类型，引用类型就不能为 null。However, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], `defaultValue` can be non-null for a reference type as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type. 例如， `Int32` 可以将一个值分配给类型为的参数 。For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a parameter of type . 这不符合 CLS，但在互操作方案中可能很有用。This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.

exception.span: 该参数不是受支持的类型之一。

span.span: The parameter is not one of the supported types.
-or-

exception.span: 的类型与该参数的类型不匹配。

span.span: The type of does not match the type of the parameter.
-or-

exception.span: 该参数的类型为 或其他引用类型，并且 不是 ，该值无法赋给引用类型。

span.span: The parameter is of type or other reference type, is not , and the value cannot be assigned to the reference type.
Sets a custom attribute.
